message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product.  However, I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $950,000 for it.  What do you think?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,050,000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
